title: The Existential Horror of Thursday Night Football
description: On the whole, the N.F.L.’s Thursday night games aren’t statistically worse than the rest of the schedule and draw more viewers than “Young Sheldon.” So why do they get such a bad rap?
dc:creator: Mike Tanier
media:description: A Week 5 matchup meant to showcase Russell Wilson and Matt Ryan leading their new teams ended up being headlined by Chase McLaughlin, who kicked the Colts’ game-winning field goal in overtime.
